author: neu-physics
body:
#### PR description:
Changes are made based on CMSSW_11_1_0_pre4
Added longitudinal position reconstruction for RecHits in MTD BTL.
Added position judgement using position information and position error when clustering
Based on our study:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/910009/contributions/3828154/attachments/2021334/3379830/longitudinalPosition.pdf
https://indico.cern.ch/event/825902/contributions/3455359/attachments/1858923/3054344/residual_calculation_0607.pdf

#### PR validation:
Checked whether the position information is stored correctly:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/910009/contributions/3828154/attachments/2021334/3379830/longitudinalPosition.pdf
Also checked the clustering algorithm proving that decreasing the position threshold used in clustering algorithm makes the cluster include fewer RecHits.
To run the functionality:
https://github.com/neu-physics/cmssw/blob/UVA_dev/README
